description:
It feels like only yesterday we were speculating about who Negan (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) was going to kill, but it's already time for The Walking Dead's midseason finale.感觉我们不久前才刚刚在猜测Negan到底杀死了谁，可是很快我们就要迎来《行尸走肉》第七季的冬歇了。

This Sunday's episode will be the last before the show takes a couple months off, and there are few things that need to happen to make it a satisfying conclusion to the season's first half.北京时间下周一播出的《行尸走肉》第七季将会是本季冬歇前的最后一集，我们觉得在最后一集我们想看到以下剧情才能够让我们对下半季充满期望：

1. Someone has to die
No character viewers know well has died since the premiere (that we know of... Heath, you OK?), which is an eternity in Walking Dead time. The midseason finale is a time to shake things up with a major death. 1. 要有角色领盒饭
自从本季开播以来，已经很久没角色领盒饭了，这可是《行尸走肉》啊。冬歇集总要有相关剧情，让某个主要角色领盒饭吧。

2. Daryl's going to escape
Daryl (Norman Reedus) has been in the Saviors' clutches since the season premiere. In the midseason finale, he's going to make a run for it.2. Daryl逃跑

Daryl从本季开播以来就被关在救世军牢房里，在上半季的最后一集里我们希望看到他能逃出来。

3. Rick's going to step up
Rick (Andrew Lincoln) has been a total sad sack so far this season, carrying water for Negan and telling everyone "this is how it is now." That's going to be revealed as an act, like it was in the comics, and Rick's going to tell someone about his secret plan to take down Negan. 3. Rick振作起来

Rick从本季开始就一直相当沮丧沉默，跟大家传播“事已至此”的悲观信号。我们希望可以看到像漫画中的剧情，Rick告诉某些角色他反抗Negan的秘密计划。
